name: nubby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having bumps (= raised, usually round areas on a surface): I really like the nubby texture of this fabric. The handle is a good size and has a nubby surface so it won't slip in your hand.
More examplesFewer examplesHer landscapes are characterized by dramatic skies over nubby green hills.She was wearing a very cosy-looking nubby knitted cardigan.I have started using this massager that has nubby wooden knobs on it that you rub against your skin.
